content.help: Whether enemies added by this mod have unbreakable power armor, making them harder to defeat

content.text: Chance that power armored Knights will wear T-60 (or T-45/T-51 with BPAO)
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Knights will wear other power armor sets, such as X-02, if available

content.text: Chance that power armored Paladins will wear T-60
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Paladins will wear other power armor sets, such as T-65, if available

content.text: Chance to get rare power armor sets
content.help: The chance that raiders will get rare power armor sets, like full painted Excavator sets

content.text: Chance to get rare power armor pieces
content.help: The chance that mixed sets will contain rare power armor pieces like X-01

content.text: Chance to get full power armor sets
content.help: The chance that a scavenger in power armor will have a full rusty set instead of a mixed set

content.text: These settings affect how often you will see power armored enemies. These only apply to enemies that Power Armor to the People knows about, and only if the area / enemy is high enough level, so setting a spawn rate to 100% does not mean every enemy will have power armor.
Scale Spawn Rate Based on Level
content.help: If enabled, spawn rates will start at half what is configured and scale up linearly until around level 40

content.text: These settings change the chance of seeing legendary power armor and what kinds of legendary effects they can have. These effects may be restricted to only certain parts, such as the chest or legs, but many can apply to any piece.

content.help: The chance that legendary power armor drops instead of legendary armor. At 100%, no legendary armor will ever drop.

content.text: Power Armored Enemy Legendary Equipment Chance
content.help: The chance that normal power armored enemies will have a single piece of legendary power armor equipped

content.text: Legendary Power Armored Enemy Legendary Equipment Chance
content.help: The chance that legendary power armored enemies will have a single piece of legendary power armor equipped
For power armor sets that can be sold as legendary items, the chance that they will be

content.help: Make Nuka-World's Overboss power armor eligible as a drop from legendary enemies

content.help: The chance of getting legendary items from the Settler Vigilante vendor-o-tron
Legendary effects that can apply to any piece of standard armor (Bolstering, VATS Enhanced, etc)
Legendary effects that can apply only to the chest piece of standard armor (Unyielding, Cryogenic, etc)
Reduces jet pack AP drain by 15% and weighs significantly less
Quadruples durability
Increases underwater movement speed by 30%
Can be upgraded with an additional miscellaneous mod
Impact landing does double damage
Fusion cores last 10% longer
Grants increasing energy and damage resistance the closer it is to breaking (up to +45)
Reload heavy guns 20% faster
Power attacks and gun bashing do 25% more damage
5% chance to deal 100 damage to ranged attackers
Increases wearer's movement speed by 10%
Whether the Reflecting effect plays a sound when it damages ranged attackers

content.text: Place all unique items, regardless of installed mods
content.help: If a unique effect is for power armor that isn't installed, an installed one will be used instead

content.text: Allow unique effects on legendary drops
content.help: Allow any or all of the unique effects for standard legendary power armor drops

content.text: Use at your own discretion. Using these means that you may get a powerful effect early in the game. For arms and legs, the effect is allowed for either left or right to allow for any combination, but using two of the same effect is not advised. One of them will either do nothing, or the effect could be too strong.

content.help: Deal 20% more damage while indoors (Helmet only)
+1 to all SPECIAL stats if you have less than 1000 caps (Helmet only)
Bonus to pacification chance and distance, and pacification now works on enemies that are higher level than you (Helmet only)
Radiation exposure increases Action Point refresh speed (Torso only)
Fly higher and faster when using a jet pack (Torso only)
There is a 1% chance that a synth will be teleported to aid you whenever you are hit (Torso only)
1% chance of preventing damage from an attack, and a 3% chance of adding ballistic ammo from attacks to your inventory (Torso only)
Fusion core does not drain for 5 seconds after taking energy damage, and there is a 3% chance of adding energy ammo from attacks to your inventory (Torso only)
If you have the Ricochet perk, increases the chance of a ricochet (Arms only, does not stack)
Doubles Pain Train damage and stagger (Arms only, does not stack)
Unarmed attacks ignore 30% of target's armor (Arms only, does not stack)
If you have at least 250 rads, radiation exposure makes power armor indestructible (Arms only, does not stack)
Hitting an enemy with Pain Train restores 20 Action Points and increases speed by 10% for 10 seconds (Legs only)
Increases carry capacity by 15 for each heavy gun in your inventory, up to a maximum of 5 (Legs only)
Radiation exposure makes fusion cores last 50% longer (Legs only)
Increases movement speed by 20% when outnumbered (Legs only)

content.text: Add Carry Capacity for Mini-Nukes and Missiles
content.help: Recommended for Survival Mode if you don't disable ammo weight
Whether you need to have a Cryolator in their inventory for Cryogenerator to produce cryo cells
Cryogenerator won't produce cryo cells if you already have at least this many

content.text: Power Armor to the People replaces or removes the full set added by most power armor mods for the sake of progression and to make finding the sets more interesting. If you would prefer to keep these full sets intact, you can permanently enable them for current and future modded sets using the button below.
This action cannot be undone, so please make sure to back up your save before proceeding.
Add Full Abandoned Sets Back to the World
content.help: You will see a confirmation notification after closing MCM

content.text: Most weapon mods that are distributed via leveled list will be available to power armored enemies as well. However, some weapons are not available this way and may be desirable only for power armored enemies. If the mod containing a weapon below is available and the setting is enabled, it will be made available.

content.help: Provide cosmic cannons to power armored Gunners
Provide heavy incinerators to power armored Gunners and Forged
Provide solar cannons to power armored Gunners
Provide tesla cannons to power armored Gunners and Brotherhood of Steel at high levels
Provide Thunderbolts to power armored Gunners
Provide Broadsiders to power armored Raiders
Provide Cryolators to power armored Gunners
Provide the arc welder to power armored Raiders
Provide the Enclave Plasma to Gunners in Tesla power armor
Provide the heavy select shotgun to power armored Raiders
Provide the machine guns to power armored Raiders, Gunners, and the Brotherhood of Steel
Provide the miniguns to power armored Raiders, Gunners, and the Brotherhood of Steel
Provide the Mk 41 to power armored Gunners and the Brotherhood of Steel
Provide Tesla Heavy Autocannons to the Brotherhood of Steel and power armored Gunners
Provide Ultracite laser rifles and gatling lasers to power armored Brotherhood of Steel

content.text: The legendary and unique effects that change the jet pack's AP drain and thrust require a base value to center their changes around. This can be the default in the game files, or it can be managed here. If you have mods that add jet packs you can wear without power armor, these settings also allow you to have different settings for those jet packs compared to power armor jet packs.
Allow Power Armor to the People to Manage Jet Pack Game Settings
content.help: Use the configuration values from this screen instead of the default game settings
How quickly AP drains while using the jet pack
How high the jet pack will propel you

content.text: There are no standalone jet packs in the base game. You will need a mod like CROSS Jetpack, Secret Service Armor, etc, for these settings to do anything.

content.help: How quickly AP drains while using the jet pack
How high the jet pack will propel you
